Metadata.Title: 10.5.3 Send Logs to Secure Storage Promptly

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 10.5.3
==Policy Statement==
Backup current log promptly to a centralized log server or a media that is difficult to alter.
==Policy Purpose==
Logs should be backed up to a secure location promptly to prevent tampering.
